member.name: M:atcEvents.atcEventBase.EventSplit(atcData.atcTimeseries,atcData.atcTimeseriesSource,System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Divide a timeseries into a group of timeseries, one per event
member.param: atcDataSource to assign as the source of event timeseries
Threshold value that must be exceeded to begin an event
Number of days of values not exceeding aThresh to include within an event. If zero, any value at or below aThresh ends the event.
True to select values above aThresh, False to select values below aThresh
